sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const Table = () => { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const fetchUrl = "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts"; useEffect(() => { async function fetchData() { const info = await axios.get(fetchUrl); setData(info.data) } fetchData(); }, [fetchUrl]); console.log(data); return (
{data.map((da) => )}
Title Description Deadline Priority Is Complete Action
{da.title} {da.description} {da.deadline} {da.priority} {da.iscomplete} Edit
Add New Post
) } export default Table;
